about_the_game:
Adult Content Warning
This game is strictly intended for an adult audience. It includes elements of violence, explicit scenes, and the use of illegal substances. All characters depicted in this game are adults and of legal age without exception. The scenes and situations portrayed in the game are meant for a mature audience and should not be interpreted as encouragement to replicate such behaviors in real life.



Are you ready for an adventure that will change your life? Welcome to ‘The Last Oasis Before Chastity’, where you are the hero of the story. The game begins with a message from an unknown sender, simply reading “RUN!!!” that wakes you up in the middle of the night at 3:14. Without hesitation, you flee your city and apartment building, leaving your heavy past behind. But you soon realize that the danger is not far behind, as a ruthless mercenary group is hot on your tail, determined to capture you and your wards at any cost. You must think fast and stay one step ahead of them if you want to survive.

You embark on a journey across the country, ultimately arriving at “The Last Oasis Before Chastity” – a desert oasis like no other. This is the last stop before Chastity, a city 666 miles away, and it is crucial that you stock up on enough water, gas, and food before leaving, as there is nothing between here and Chastity. But fate has other plans for you, as an unexpected event forces you to stay in the oasis for a while, giving you the chance to uncover its secrets and the truth behind that mysterious message. Explore the oasis’ bar, motel, diner, gas station, and even a water tower with a pink caravan at its base.

Some say the name “The Last Oasis Before Chastity” holds a double meaning, as it is not only the last chance to resupply, but also the last chance for pleasure before a long period of abstinence.

The game is set in a scorching desert environment, but don’t let the heat fool you – there’s a touch of humor and unexpected twists around every corner. Meet an array of interesting and attractive characters, each with their own unique backstory to uncover.

What secrets does “The Last Oasis Before Chastity” hold? The adventure is yours to discover in ‘The Last Oasis Before Chastity’ as you uncover the truth behind that mysterious message and leave your heavy past behind.



This game is the creation of a dedicated and passionate enthusiast, with a meticulous attention to detail. It features a plethora of side stories. My goal is to craft a rich and captivating narrative, with fully developed characters, each imbued with meaningful purpose and depth within the story.

This game is designed to deliver an immersive story, rich in detail and complexity, with well-crafted characters that players will grow to care about.

  • Approximately 6 hours of gameplay.
  • Players will find that their choices have real consequences.
  • The game features a plethora of beautiful female characters with diverse personalities and styles.
  • The game boasts stunning visuals and landscapes, unlike anything else seen in the VN world.
  • Over 3,000 images and more than 200 animations.
  • Numerous sexual scenes with over 20 women.



As you embark on a thrilling journey through three distinct paths of illegal car races, underground fights and dangerous gang activities, the choices you make will determine your survival as each path offers its own unique challenges, opportunities, and consequences.



Enter the underground world of illegal fighting, where only the strongest survive. Rise through the ranks, push your limits and emerge victorious as the champion of the underground fight circuit. It's time to prove your worth and dominate the competition.



Welcome to the underground world of illegal racing, where the stakes are high and the only rule is to be the first one to cross the finish line. Push your car to the limit and upgrade it to the max, leaving your opponents in the dust. It's time to prove yourself and become the champion of the street.



You wanna make a quick buck and live life on the edge? Join our crew and we'll show you the ins and outs of the game. We're talkin' about pullin' off daring heists, hijackin' big-rigs loaded with cash, and makin' a killing in the streets. But remember, one wrong move and it's all over. You in or you out?

short_description: Amidst the barren desert, an oasis shines like a beacon of hope, accessible only by a solitary road. The scorching sands loom on one side, while the weight of the past hangs heavy on the other. It’s a place where one can escape the harsh realities, but also confront them.
